oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Gannaway Television Series: "The Country Show"
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording is of a variety of songs performed for the Gannaway television series: "The Country Show". The tape features performances by Jim Reeves (musician/host), Ernest Tubb (musician), Lew Childre (musician), Cousin Jody and (musician) . Recording is from an unknown date. The tape is the sixth of six tapes.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Jim Reeves; Ernest Tubb; Lew Childre; Cousin Jody;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Faron Young introduces the show -- (00:14) (Unidentified fiddle tune) (Faron Young) -- (00:56) Mexican Joe (Jim Reeves) -- (02:40) Jim Reeves discusses the Country Show and introduces Ernest Tubb -- (03:09) I'll Step Aside (Ernest Tubb) -- (05:46) Reeves praises Tubb and introduces Lew Childre -- (06:26) Rabbit in the Log (Lew Childre) -- (08:02) Reeves jokes about Childre and introduces Cousin Jody -- (08:31) Jody and Reeves joke about small creatures -- (09:07) No Help Wanted (Cousin Jody and the Country Cousins) -- (10:50) Reeves introduces the Carolina Cloggers -- (11:02) (Unidentified fiddle tune) (Unidentified) -- (13:27) I'm Hurting Inside (Jim Reeves) -- (15:32) Reeves introduces Childre -- (15:51) Dance, Chicken Reel (Lew Childre) -- (16:35) Reeves and Childre joke, and Reeves introduces Tubb -- (17:28) I'll Get Along Somehow (Ernest Tubb) -- (19:43) Reeves says his goodbyes to the audience -- (20:05) Unidentified fiddle tune (Jim Reeves)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Reeves, Jim; Tubb, Ernest; Tubb, Ernest, 1914-1984; Childre, Lew; Childre, Lew, 1901-1961; Cousin Jody;
